config.opacity.name: Shadow Opacity
config.opacity.tooltip: How dark the shadows are (0.1 = faint, 1.0 = solid black).
config.scale.name: Shadow Scale
config.scale.tooltip: Size of the shadows relative to the fish items.
config.fade.name: Enable Fade Effects
config.fade.tooltip: If true, fish fade in smoothly when spawning and fade out when leaving.
config.max-fish.name: Max Fish
config.max-fish.tooltip: Maximum number of fish allowed in one location.
config.density.name: Spawn Density
config.density.tooltip: Probability of a fish spawning per tile check.
config.farm-only.name: Farm Only
config.farm-only.tooltip: If true, fish only appear on the farm.
config.excluded.name: Excluded Locations
config.excluded.tooltip: Comma-separated list of location names to ignore (e.g. Sewer, BugLand).
config.hide-night.name: Hide at Night
config.hide-night.tooltip: If true, fish will disappear after sunset.
config.sunset-offset.name: Hours After Sunset
config.sunset-offset.tooltip: How many hours after sunset before fish disappear (Default: 2).
